text: The mother of a man who lived east of the city died and he mourned his death, but his cry didn't sound sad enough. Seeing this, the son of a woman who lived west of the city said to his mother, "Why don't you die soon? I promise to cry with great discomfort. It will be hard for a man who desires the death of his mother to mourn her bitterly. FIN
title: Llorando la muerte de una madre
author: nan Anónimo
